verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Buried with Christ and raised with Him too, What is there left for me to do? Simply to cease from struggling and strife, Simply to walk in newness of life.

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: Risen with Christ my glorious Head, Holiness now the pathway I tread; Beautiful thought from walking therein, He that is dead is freed from all sin.
